channel.title: Necromancer (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
Night Ability 1: Dig up grave - Dig up grave of the dead player and turn him into skeleton (You waste whole night digging up grave) Night Ability 2: Send skeleton to kill someone (After killing Skelton is destroyed)
Lore - Necromancer... strange man with black robe who have no life on his face who want to see everyone dead
Comments - You can use only one of Night Abilities in one night and you can create one skleton on the time If you dont use your skeleton in 2 nights in row he will perish

item.title: Necromancer (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Why do we need a NK that can only kill every other night? It seems extremely underpowered.

Read full topic
